name: Projet Italie
tagline: Here I will deposit the results of my work during my final year internship
body: As part of my internship working for ArcelorMittal Bissen in Luxembourg, I decided to implement computational tools, such as web developping, GeoData Mining, statistical packets, etc. Using those up-to-date engineering tools I seeked to give more precise, understandable and innovative results, and additionally, to show the people I worked with (enterprise and university) how this new technology may improve traditional methods of data analysis.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
